li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-19646 current_page_item menu-item-19658

div.p: Global Scholars Academy continues to monitor the COVID-19 global health crisis, specifically its impact on our school community.
This week the Governor closed all schools through May 15. GSA will return to learning virtually on April 1.

We’ve created this special webpage for you to easily find information regarding GSA’s response to COVID-19, digital learning resources, virtual classroom schedules and health and wellness resources including free meals for your scholars. We have also included links to reliable and up-to-date information on COVID-19 in general.

We want to thank you for your commitment to working with us to make sure your scholars continue to grow and achieve. While the tools and resources used to teach and learn will be new territory, our commitment to you and your family remains unchanged.

p.strong: *PLEASE NOTE- This page will be updated as new information and resources are available.

div.p:
Global Scholars Academy was designed to connect at-risk Durham area youth to a wide array of intellectual and social capital resources, both “high touch” and virtual.
Learn more...
